name: grove (quixoticdicker)
description:
A relaxing game about watering your house plants. Click a pot to focus on that plant. Click the dirt to begin watering. Press "space" to return to the room view. Press "1" to learn how to care for your plants.

This is a beta build, so while all the features are there that I want in the final version, I plan on polishing it up a bit.

Special thanks to savannah.smackdown for her help with the audio.
